settings.custom_liquid:
<style>
.announcement-bar-section,
nav.header__inline-menu.nnn {
  display: none;
}
.header--middle-center a.header__heading-link {
    text-align: center;
    justify-self: center;
}
.header {
    grid-template-areas:
        "left-icons heading icons"
        "navigation navigation navigation";
    grid-template-columns: 1fr auto 1fr;
}
header-drawer, .header__icons {
display: none;
}
.footer__content-top.page-width {
    display: none;
}
</style>

settings.heading:
Let the
adventure
begin!
settings.subheading:
Hi, new mama!

As you embark on this beautiful journey of motherhood, UpSpring is here to cheer you on along the way with guidance, support, and everyday essentials.

settings.title: Carrying
settings.text:
Congrats, expecting mama!
We know this stage can have its share of occasional nausea, tummy troubles, and morning sickness misery, so we created Stomach Settle drops to bring you convenient relief wherever you are.

settings.title: Feeding
settings.text: Getting into a new routine and rhythm while breastfeeding isn’t always easy. We designed Milkflow and Milkscreen to help you feel assured your milk supply is strong, and that your little one is being nurtured well.

settings.title: Recovering
settings.text:
Giving birth is half the battle. Feeling restored after labor is a journey in itself. Our daily postpartum wear was designed to give your body the extra
support you deserve after birthing a tiny human.

"[Upspring] saved my breastfeeding relationship with my son ♥"

– Alysia W.

settings.title: At UpSpring, we nurture the nurturers™ so, you will feel cared for, too.
settings.content:
The core of everything we do is about seeking to understand the challenges and joys of motherhood. That means we're committed to creating everyday solutions that resonate with moms like you and make your life easier.

You're never alone on this journey. We're here to celebrate the victories and endure the challenges alongside you. We believe in fostering a community of like-minded mamas who share the same values and embrace the adventure of motherhood – the day-to-day beauty and diaper blowouts alike.

settings.text: Enjoy 20% off when you join the UpSpring community.
